title: When Some One Pokes You And You Just All In Them

replies.body:
Nerf cat, too much mobility.

Na but srsly, that's literally how I feel playing against Nidalee.

Funny, thats how I feel playing Vi vs Nidalee.

Ow, quit it.
Ow, quit it.
Ow, quit i- GOTCHA NOW MUDDAFKUKA!
HAHAH
100 to 0 real quick. . . {{champion:107}} **Rengar Intensifies** {{champion:107}}

Ah, I love Vi... people don't like her point and click ultimate, but she doesn't give a shit about your mobility.

And unlike almost everyone else's hops and leaps, her only technically mobile move has a visual and charge time, leaving plenty of counterplay (considering how much of a punch it can pack, thank God).

But still. Fuck yo mobility, that's Vi's motto.
just putting the fact that your chargeable ability is basically a flash. it can go through any terrain

Not... quite. It can go through terrain, yes, but it's not quite like a flash due to the charge up (flash is typically used more as a reaction). If you can get it charged up *then* decide to switch tracks from hitting someone to gtfo, then basically yeah. But it's not instant like Lee's ward hop (or his Q for initiating), and it takes Vi with her so it's not exactly a ranged skillshot. Not to mention her MS goes down while she uses it... there's a lot better mobile moves.

It's probably only allowed to be so powerful due to said drawbacks, at least. She's a monster in the right hands.
did someone say in the right hands? XD

Okay, in the average player's hands, she's like the cookie monster. A monster, but not an uber monster.

Put her in the hands of a jungle main or something and you learn to fear and respect the twin fists of fury. Hell, people like me don't even use her ultimate as an execute, we use it to fuck up teamfights.

I love using it to dive the back line after putting her entire team in front of me if i know i have a good support base. It's funny as hell to ult someone and get yourself a runover kill just because your ult deals damage to everyone that gets in the way between yourself and the target. 

it's also a great way to focus fleeing targets. i've used it several times to attack the person in front of my target just to get runover damage and ult damage on two targets before finishing the low guy in the back. sets up great combos sometimes.

It's also a great disruption. Since Vi is technically an assassin bruiser, it gives the enemy choice two options: focus you instead of your team (great if you built tanky!), or focus your team and lose their carry.
If it was a flash then veigar a event horizon wouldn't stop her dead in her tracks....just saiyian
I have more an issue with Vi's ult making her untargetable.

She's not, she's just immune to cc (might be hard to click if she's going fast, so I recommend quick cast for... quicker casting.).

I remember back when I was a noob and all those times I ulted while at low health... and died.
yup but then you learned how to make it work and then were like GOTCHA MUDDAFUCKA

Ah... those were the days. 

Then I learned how to build defenses on her once people started learning how to quick cast. She can't be cc'd (much to a support's fury), but she can be hit by targeted and aoe spells. If you're not at full health or you don't have any defenses, diving an entire team at once is not always the smartest idea.
Hahahaha

Valor!!!
TO ME!

This is exactly how I feel as {{champion:75}} when I'm busy stacking and they just won't fuck off. So eventually I just give them the fight they are begging for and I wither them and 3 shot them with my pimp cane. Then they cry in allchat that Nasus is so OP, I'm like "Bitch, I never wanted to fight, you wouldn't stop poking and I was getting tired of it".

{{champion:17}} Now you're blind.
{{champion:133}} And Blinded again.

***RIOT:*** I sense a disturbance in the sands.

*stealth buff: Q is no longer affected by Blinds.*

i poke elise with a flamethrower

This is why I like Irelia.

Oh, Jayce, you're trying to poke me? Q-E-W-CHALLENGINGSMITE-SHEENPROCS-R!
One of many reasons why she is my main! I love having the feeling of being in control and Irelia satisfies that extremely well. :)
well as long as it remains in the virtual world and never comes through in the real world you just keep thinking your a big man in the game
Its a game and all about having fun and possibly challenging your reflex's. Don't need to be an ass about some one enjoying a game...

{{champion:75}} I swear to god teemo poke me one more time.
"An enemy has been slain"
Every time I play against a nidalee in aram and im varus, I always aim my Qs on her to get revenge.
Did anyone else notice that that cat knows how to fly? I mean it got 2-3 seconds of airtime....

My own cat was caught jumping out of trees to catch birds mid-flight a few times.

How she never got hurt, I don't know. But it was something to see.

This is like playing vs teemo
Oi stop that
Oi stop poking me
Stop i swear to god
